trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the record.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controlar gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> evento quando um botão de exclusão (um botão com seu `CommandName` propriedade definida como "Excluir") é clicado, mas antes de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle exclui o registro.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você forneça um método de manipulação de eventos que executa uma rotina personalizada, como cancelar a operação de exclusão, sempre que esse evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar programaticamente uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventHandler> delegar para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> eventos de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar declarativamente uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventHandler> delegar para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> eventos de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle.
